connector.description:
Send data to Splunk either by using "submit" or "stream" mode.

The payload MUST be in json format.

camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.serverHostname.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.serverHostname
camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.serverHostname.description: The address of your Splunk server. Example: my_server_splunk.com

camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.serverPort.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.serverPort
camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.serverPort.description: The address of your Splunk server.

camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.username.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.username
camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.username.description: The username to authenticate to Splunk Server.

camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.password.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.password
camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.password.description: The password to authenticate to Splunk Server.

camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.source.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.source
camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.source.description: The source named field of the data.

camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.sourceType.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.sourceType
camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.sourceType.description: The source named field of the data.

camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.connectionTime.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.connectionTimeout
camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.connectionTime.description: Timeout in milliseconds when connecting to Splunk server

camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.mode.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.mode
camel.kamelet.splunk-sink.mode.description: The mode to publish events to Splunk.
